explanation: [0-0] A man in a green shirt sits at a computer desk, trying to touch a gray kitten on the computer screen with his hand.
[0-2] The man in green keeps trying to touch the kitten on the screen. At this moment, a man wearing an eye patch walks out from behind a door with an angry expression and waving fists.
[0-2] The man in green keeps trying to touch the kitten on the screen. At this moment, a man wearing an eye patch walks out from behind a door with an angry expression and waving fists.

[2-10] Startled by the sudden appearance of the man, the man in green turns his head to the left. His clothes become torn, his mouth twists to the side, and both his hands tremble in front of him. The man with the eye patch points at him angrily and then waves his arms. Holding a blue cat climbing frame, the man in green stands up and walks to the left. Then, the man with the eye patch sits in front of the screen, points at the kitten with both hands, stands up angrily, and waves his arms. The man in green stands at the door holding the cat climbing frame and nods his head.

[10-17] The man with the eye patch appears in the picture again. He is leaning against a pillow, looking at the mobile phone in front of him. On the phone screen is a picture of an eye model. The man keeps zooming in and out of the picture. At this time, the man in green appears at the door, scratches his head, and enters the room. Then the man with the eye patch appears in the picture again. Behind him is a tall yellow wardrobe. White subtitles appear in the picture.
